REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2394 reute d f BC-PICO-<PPI>,-ANIXTER-G 03-20 0054

TEXT.TITLE: PICO <PPI>, ANIXTER GET TELE-COMM <TCOM> ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Pico Products Inc and <Anixter Communications> jointly announced that they received a purchase order from Tele-Communications Inc, for pay TV security products to be included in Tele-Comm's on-site control systems. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
